data.description:
This is the third re-write of Mobile VR Station and was based upon the successful iOS/Android versions, but re-imagined to work only in VR.  The player has been built from the ground up to display 2D & 3D content on various projections such as Plane, Spherical, Dome, Full Dome, Curved and EAC.  The player is still being developed and additional features will be added over time.

The player will continue in its freemium tradition and allows you to try all features before buying.  The only limitation of the free version is it will only play the first five minutes of any video, but you are free to make sure it works with your content and has all the needed features at your leisure.  We offer support on our Facebook page if you have any questions and links are available inside the app to our various pages, online tutorials and the extensive help guide.

changelog.change_log: Added in functionality to load in *.ovrscene, *.glb and *.gltf files which can function as a virtual background.  These virtual backgrounds can be really complex and may cause memory issues.
Added support for subtitles via external SRT files.  Also added in profile options under Graphics to control how subtitles are displayed.

1. Fixing an issue with HTTP content being blocked
2. Media volume enhancements

1. Language Fixes
2. Enlarged text
3. Using latest Oculus SDK that works with Gear VR

1. Samba Support for Browsing, Streaming and Downloading
2. Ftp support for Streaming
3. Language Support (38 Available, new Setting to change the default, if you prefer English)
4. More exception messages for FTP & Samba issues
5. Larger Text in general to better display foreign languages

1. New File & DLNA Sorting Logic (Sort by Size, Duration & Name)
2. Better Quit support, pressing back from the main player brings up the Oculus menu
3. Frame Rate Profile Option.  Oculus Go can choose between 60 and 72 fps.
4. You can now quickly reset your history from the main content chooser, by using the Configuration action

1. Fixed an issue where left & right were reversed
2. Added in a Frame Counter that you can enabled in the Profile
3. Fixed a few file sorting issues
5. "Swipe Folder" is now enabled by default.  Swipe right to choose and Swipe Left to go back
6. Updated to latest Video Player

1. Control updates
A. Added Gear VR Touchpad Support (Can flip between Touchpad and Controller)
B. Reworked swipe logic (It is actually useful now)
2. Better shuffle controls
A. Added option to go back
3. Updated image loading
4. New Profile Options 
A. Sticky Presets (Last selected preset applies to next item)
B. Swipe to navigate has been added as an option
C. Moved around a few items
5. Fixed preset management issue

1. Shuffle has been added to the app.  You can control the delay and other options from your profile.
2. A few messages have been added to the main menu to point out key features.  You can disable the messages from your Profile.
3. Fixed an issue where Purchases were not recognized when offline
4. The message about unlocking Premium now has a link to the Store on the same screen

1. Animated GIF playback support has been added
2. The main player's jump bar will now display the time your pointing at
3. Fixes for playing audio files
